alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 19 at 7:50PM MDT until June 20 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT TUESDAY... ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... ...HEAT ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Temperatures up to 106 or 107 expected Tuesday with temperatures up to 108 degrees Wednesday. * WHERE...Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, from Noon to 8 PM MDT Tuesday. For the second Heat Advisory, from Noon to 8 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
